channel.title: Help with compiling?
channel.description:
This is probably one of the dumbest questions ever, but...
I've recently reinstalled windows because my comp had too much space taken up. So, I've downloaded the source and client I was using for my server and I can succesfully run it. But if I try to compile it says 'the system cannot find the path specified'. If i remember correctly, I have to make my computer recognize the coding or something, but I don't remember how. Can anybody help?

item.title: Help with compiling?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

You need to do the classpaths for enviroment variables.

Read full topic
